CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability for meeting participants to edit their display name
CurrentVersion.description: Teams meeting participants will be able to edit their display name, enabling more flexibility in their meeting presence, regardless of their tenant set display name. Users can make this change during the meeting and it will persist throughout the duration of the meeting.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability for meeting participants to edit their display name
OldVersion.description: Teams meeting participants will be able to edit their display name, enabling more flexibility in their meeting presence, regardless of their tenant set display name. Users can make this change during the meeting and it will persist throughout the duration of the meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Spell check in Viva Learning search
CurrentVersion.description: User queries will be spell checked and corrected for all in-app Search.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Spell check in Viva Learning search
OldVersion.description: User queries will be spell checked and corrected for all in-app Search.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Queues app (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: The new Queues app is a solution for collaboratively handling customer calls natively in Teams. Starting with surfacing call queue calls, your team members can use the Queues app to handle inbound calls, be it PSTN or VOIP. They can make outbound calls on behalf of the call queues or auto attendant that they are assigned to. And they can review the call queue statistics and seamlessly collaborate with their lead and colleagues within the flow of work. Authorized users, with permissions from Teams admins, can monitor their call queues and auto attendants in realtime, generate reports on queue and agent performance, configure their call queues and auto attendants using Teams settings, and opt in or out their team members to optimize for business needs. This is a Teams Premium feature.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Queues app (Premium)
OldVersion.description: The new Queues app is a solution for collaboratively handling customer calls natively in Teams. Starting with surfacing call queue calls, your team members can use the Queues app to handle inbound calls, be it PSTN or VOIP. They can make outbound calls on behalf of the call queues or auto attendant that they are assigned to. And they can review the call queue statistics and seamlessly collaborate with their lead and colleagues within the flow of work. Authorized users, with permissions from Teams admins, can monitor their call queues and auto attendants in realtime, generate reports on queue and agent performance, configure their call queues and auto attendants using Teams settings, and opt in or out their team members to optimize for business needs. This is a Teams Premium feature.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Proximity Join via Ultrasound
CurrentVersion.description: With ultrasound for proximity join, users can more accurately discover and add the Teams Room they are in to their Teams meeting. The user's companion device detects ultrasound beacons emitted only within the physical Teams Room, providing a more accurate list of nearby room options on the pre-join meeting screen.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Proximity Join via Ultrasound
OldVersion.description: With ultrasound for proximity join, users can more accurately discover and add the Teams Room they are in to their Teams meeting. The user's companion device detects ultrasound beacons emitted only within the physical Teams Room, providing a more accurate list of nearby room options on the pre-join meeting screen.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Workflows within File Chiclet
CurrentVersion.description: You will now be able to run instant workflows and create new file workflows via the file chiclet overflow menu (...)

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Workflows within File Chiclet
OldVersion.description: You will now be able to run instant workflows and create new file workflows via the file chiclet overflow menu (...)

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Cross location Shifts
CurrentVersion.description: Cross-Location Shifts empowers organizations by enabling their Frontline workers to access and select open shifts from multiple locations within a region. Managers benefit from a larger labor pool by opening shift availability across multiple locations: a worker from one store location may select a shift in any other store across their region. This feature is accessible both via desktop and mobile.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Cross location Shifts
OldVersion.description: Cross-Location Shifts empowers organizations by enabling their Frontline workers to access and select open shifts from multiple locations within a region. Managers benefit from a larger labor pool by opening shift availability across multiple locations: a worker from one store location may select a shift in any other store across their region. This feature is accessible both via desktop and mobile.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Multiple camera view for Teams Room on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Teams Room on Windows will support up to four single stream cameras that will be shown to remote meeting attendees. With multiple camera view, remote meeting attendees will have the ability to follow all the action in the room and manually toggle between views from the room that they want to see.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Multiple camera view for Teams Room on Windows
OldVersion.description: Teams Room on Windows will support up to four single stream cameras that will be shown to remote meeting attendees. With multiple camera view, remote meeting attendees will have the ability to follow all the action in the room and manually toggle between views from the room that they want to see.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Native controls on console for OEM camera features
CurrentVersion.description: In Teams Rooms on Windows meeting rooms, you can now directly control camera features provided by OEMs. Controllable features include group framing, active speaker framing, and OEM specific IntelliFrame views composed on the in-room devices.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Native controls on console for OEM camera features
OldVersion.description: In Teams Rooms on Windows meeting rooms, you can now directly control camera features provided by OEMs. Controllable features include group framing, active speaker framing, and OEM specific IntelliFrame views composed on the in-room devices.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New security and certification information available for apps and extensions
CurrentVersion.description:
This feature will equip administrators evaluating apps and
copilot extensions for deployment with extensive security and related certification data to help those admins more quickly evaluate that an app and/or extension complies with their tenant security requirements. Initially, the information provided will include results
from individual M365 certification tests and evidence submitted by ISVs during
Microsoft's audit of their app or copilot extension. Additionally, for
non-certified apps, admins will receive details on data handling, security, and
compliance as self-attested by the ISV.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New security and certification information available for apps and extensions
OldVersion.description:
This feature will equip administrators evaluating apps and
copilot extensions for deployment with extensive security and related certification data to help those admins more quickly evaluate that an app and/or extension complies with their tenant security requirements. Initially, the information provided will include results
from individual M365 certification tests and evidence submitted by ISVs during
Microsoft's audit of their app or copilot extension. Additionally, for
non-certified apps, admins will receive details on data handling, security, and
compliance as self-attested by the ISV.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Network Strength icon to understand strength of your network
CurrentVersion.description: Quickly understand strength of your network along with suggestions to conserve bandwidth if you are experiencing networking issues.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Network Strength icon to understand strength of your network
OldVersion.description: Quickly understand strength of your network along with suggestions to conserve bandwidth if you are experiencing networking issues.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Remote contact management for common area phones
CurrentVersion.description: IT admins will be able to manage and add contacts to Teams phone devices deployed in shared spaces through the Teams admin center. This ensures users across the organization can easily call important contacts, such as emergency numbers or help desks.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Remote contact management for common area phones
OldVersion.description: IT admins will be able to manage and add contacts to Teams phone devices deployed in shared spaces through the Teams admin center. This ensures users across the organization can easily call important contacts, such as emergency numbers or help desks.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Notes powered by Loop now available for Microsoft 365 GCC High and DoD
CurrentVersion.description: Teams Notes, powered by Loop, is now available for Microsoft 365 GCC High and DoD environments. Teams Notes are Loop components in Teams meetings and chats that allow end users to co-create and collaborate on their meeting agenda, notes, and action items that can be co-authored and edited by everyone. Since Notes are Loop components, they stay in sync across all the places they have been shared. Assigned Tasks automatically sync with ToDo and Planner.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Town halls now available in GCC-High
CurrentVersion.description: Set up and host large scale events across a GCC-High organization with the familiar Teams app you use for webinars and meetings using town hall. Town hall capabilities include a new meeting template, capacity for up to 10k attendees, green room, the ability to manage what attendees see, RTMP-in, live translated captions, and more.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Town halls in GCC-High (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Set up and host large scale events across a GCC-High organization with the familiar Teams app you use for meetings using town hall. Town hall capabilities include a new meeting template, capacity for up to 20k attendees, green room, the ability to manage what attendees see, RTMP-in, live translated captions, and more.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365: Create Dynamic rule-based backup policies for Microsoft 365 Backup
CurrentVersion.description: Create backup policies for your SharePoint, OneDrive, and Exchange data based on distribution lists and security groups memberships, and have the tool automatically update these policies based on dynamic membership changes.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365: Create full-workload backup policies for Microsoft 365 Backup
CurrentVersion.description: Automatically backup all Exchange or OneDrive users and/or SharePoint sites in the tenant and have the tool automatically add new users/sites to the backup policy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365: Perform granular file-level restore using Microsoft 365 Backup
CurrentVersion.description: Perform file-level browse/search and then restore using Microsoft 365 Backup. With this enhancement you will be able to browse for files across in a site from available daily restore points and apply filters to narrow results, restore at the original location by overwriting existing content or to a new place by creating a copy of the content.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365: Dedicated Backup Administrator Role for Microsoft 365 Backup
CurrentVersion.description: Use a dedicated Backup Administrator role to manage your M365 Backup administration tasks.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365: Multi-admin change notifications for Microsoft 365 Backup
CurrentVersion.description: Set of pre-defined administrators can be configured to receive email notifications for any potentially damaging changes to the backup settings or actions taken to ensure proper oversight of the tool in the organization.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365: Protection unit-level offboarding for Microsoft 365 Backup
CurrentVersion.description: Ability to permanently delete, after appropriate grace period, protection units from the backups. A protection unit is defined as a OneDrive Account, SharePoint site, or Exchange Online shared or user mailbox being protected in the Backup tool.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Breakout rooms support for Microsoft Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: With breakout room support, Teams Rooms on Windows can be added to a breakout room and moved in and out of the main room making it easy for breakout session coordination.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Breakout rooms support for Microsoft Teams Rooms on Windows
OldVersion.description: With breakout room support, Teams Rooms on Windows can be added to a breakout room and moved in and out of the main room making it easy for breakout session coordination.

Users can make this change during the meeting and it will persist throughout the duration of the meeting.
